blocks: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="procedures_defnoreturn" id="*bFR`!/*Qy|JwN!e_d?:" x="0" y="0"><field name="NAME">upgrade</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Determina qual atributo será melhorado baseado no nível do gladiador</comment><statement name="STACK"><block type="controls_if" id="Oy1}|A[)Z[m3ghwz=9b~"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_compare" id="Ug:vYh/1B})OO_i[AUoB"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="get_info" id="Z[1Fp.fcOeYNR[I3:%@3"><field name="COMPLEMENT">Lvl</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number" id="/.Nf9FEL6j?[)Q(7dA.*"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="upgrade" id="05Qm4-#8JoE.~KQ6$F|;"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" use-return="false"></mutation><field name="COMPLEMENT">STR</field><value name="VALUE"><shadow type="math_number" id="U__Tb^z0/M=or#]XJ;cg"><field name="NUM">5</field></shadow></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="upgrade" id="}oA0bi!cP*KW9;E#}jW8"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" use-return="false"></mutation><field name="COMPLEMENT">INT</field><value name="VALUE"><shadow type="math_number" id="eBu*R*EV7#!Te3{ZtlGb"><field name="NUM">5</field></shadow></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></xml>
explain: Este trecho de código verifica o nível do gladiador. Caso seja menor que 5, o gladiador melhora a força, caso contrário a inteligência.
